name.description: A unique plugin name in Java package format.

version.description: The plugin version, must be updated whenever the plugin definition is updated.

type.description: The plugin type. Currently only python is avilable

entity.description: Entity type upon which the plugin is activated

metricGroup.description: Metric group is used for grouping custom metrics into a hierarchical namespace where different sources, for example multiple plugins can contribute. Moreover, metric group becomes primary part of metric key. Hence once defined it could not be changed.

processTypes.description: Type of process that plugin monitors, as defined in the processTypes table below. This serves as an alternative to processTypeNames. This is deprecated method, please use technologies instead.

processTypeNames.description: Type of process that plugin monitors, as defined in the processTypes table below. This is deprecated method, please use technologies instead.

technologies.description: Type of technology that plugin monitors, as can be viewed on Technologies overview page.

metrics.description: The section defining metrics; see Metrics section for reference

properties.description: Configuration properties the plugin can accept.

ui.description: This part of the JSON defines how metrics are charted on each Process page.

configUI.description: The configUI section defines the configuration fields that are displayed in the UI.

source.description: Python metadata used by ActiveGate PluginModule python engine
